name: npc_dota_hero_queenofpain
bio_loc: The Ecclesiast-King of Elze nursed a desire for pain--forbidden pain. In a less prominent political figure, such desires might be considered unwise, but in a monarch of his stature, to satisfy such thirsts would have threatened the virtue of the Divine Throne itself. Therefore he turned to his dungeon full of demonologists, promising freedom to whoever could summon a personal succubus of torment and bind it entirely to his service. The creature who arrived, Akasha by name, visited upon him such exquisite torments that he named her his Secret Queen, and he began to spend all his spare moments submitting to her clever torments--eventually abdicating all his responsibilities in his pursuit of the painful pleasures that only she could bring. Queen of Pain could bring him to the brink of death, but she was rune-bound to keep him alive. At last the King's neglect of state brought on an uprising. He was dragged from his chamber and hurled from the Tower of Invocations, and at the moment of death, Queen of Pain was let loose into the world, freed from servitude--freed to visit her sufferings on anyone she deigned to notice.
hype_loc: Queen of Pain strikes without warning, destroying gathered foes with deafening screams. Should an enemy survive her onslaught, she slows their escape with a throw of her dagger before finishing them off.
npe_desc_loc: Blinks in to deal massive magical damage

facets.description_loc: Queen of Pain gains Spell Lifesteal that increases with proximity to her enemies.
facets.name: queenofpain_lifesteal

facets.description_loc: Queen of Pain has bonus Spell Amplification but a percentage of her spell damage is reflected back to her.
facets.name: queenofpain_selfdmg

abilities.name: queenofpain_shadow_strike
abilities.desc_loc: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for %duration% seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every %damage_interval% seconds.
abilities.lore_loc: Akasha's envenomed dagger allows her to delight in the drawn out suffering of her victims.
notes_loc: The affected unit slowly regains its original movement speed every second during the duration.
Units afflicted by Shadow Strike can be denied by their allies when their HP drops below 25% of their maximum health.
abilities.scepter_loc: Causes Shadow Strike to become a %aoe_radius% AoE Spell, and have increased initial damage. When Shadow Strike ends or is re-applied to an enemy Hero, the target emits a Scream of Pain, hitting any nearby enemies.

abilities.name: queenofpain_blink
abilities.desc_loc: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.
abilities.lore_loc: The Secret Queen lives up to her title, making her pain impossible to escape.
notes_loc: You can use Blink to dodge incoming projectiles.
abilities.shard_loc: Releases a sonic boom when Queen of Pain blinks, at both her starting and ending locations. Deals %shard_damage% damage in a %shard_aoe% AoE and silences the target for %shard_duration% seconds.

abilities.name: queenofpain_scream_of_pain
abilities.desc_loc: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.
abilities.lore_loc: The sultry voice of Akasha beckons her opponents while stealing their souls.
notes_loc: Scream Of Pain will hit invisible units.
Scream Of Pain cannot be disjointed.

abilities.name: queenofpain_bondage
abilities.desc_loc: Whenever an enemy within %radius% range deals spell damage to Queen of Pain, she returns %spell_reflect_pct%%% of the damage dealt.

abilities.name: queenofpain_sonic_wave
abilities.desc_loc: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake and pushing them back.
abilities.lore_loc: Her most exquisite of all of torments, Akasha's Sonic Wave puts her poor foes out of their misery.
notes_loc: Sonic Wave can hit units up to 1150 units away.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_queen_of_pain_1
talents.name_loc: +{s:bonus_attack_speed} Attack Speed against Shadow Striked units

abilities.name: queenofpain_succubus
abilities.desc_loc: Queen of Pain gains Spell Lifesteal that increases with proximity to her enemies.
notes_loc: Minimum of %spell_lifesteal%%% at %max_radius% range, increasing to %spell_lifesteal_close%%% at %close_radius% range.

abilities.name: queenofpain_masochist
abilities.desc_loc: Queen of Pain has bonus Spell Amplification but a percentage of her spell damage is reflected back to her.
